author: Football Italia staff
title: Italy camp hosts coronavirus patients
description: The Coverciano training ground, where Italy prepare their games and coaches get their badges, is becoming a makeshift hospital during the coronavirus pandemic.  	Wards are packed out in this unprecedented crisis and different buildings are being co-opted to h…
content:
The Coverciano training ground, where Italy prepare their games and coaches get their badges, is becoming a makeshift hospital during the coronavirus pandemic.
